1.16.5.B2:
- Added elemental essence energy/n
- Improved application of effects/n
- [Bugfix] Air armor can no longer be obtained in the creative/n
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones

1.17.1.1.0.0:
- Mod moved to Forge 1.17.1/n
- New texture of the water flow projectile/n
- Now water drops only have an effect while they are in the player's hand/n
- Added new magical boxes/n
- Added a separate tab for magic boxes/n
- Added elements of 8 elements from group A/n
- New tab icon with magic stones/n
- An empty stone has been added, it can be crafted using glass and 4 Nether stars/n
- Added the mod logo/n
- Added a mod update script/n
- Added some things for future mod updates/n
- [Bugfix] It is no longer possible to use multiple stones at the same time/n
- [Bugfix] Now, after death, the stone returns/n
- [Bugfix] Fixed wooden box hitbox/n
- [Bugfix] Fixed dup of shields/n
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the shield could be used several times when it was in the spare hand/n
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where a player could use a shield and after the end of the wizard effect, the shield could return/n
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
